content: add a playful touch to your halloween display with this crochet beetle charm stitched in lily sugar n cream this fun amigurumi project is offered in 3 different versions for variety practice single_crochet working in the round and applied detail techniques make it for fun around the spooky season or choose any colors you like to create a custom set that adds whimsy to your home any time of the year materials lily® sugar n cream™ 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m version 1 version 2 version 3 contrast a black 00002 1 ball contrast b hot green 01712 1 ball contrast c black currant 01318 1 ball measurements approx 4 10 cm long x 3 7 5 cm wide excluding antennae and legs
